trends: There have been no other sightings in Popoctepetl volcano
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was observing real time images for Popoctepetl volcano and noticed a cigarshaped object on the right hand side of the image. It was in relatively thesame location for a number of images moving slowly to the right I do not knowthe orientation of the camera so can not speculate about north-south etc.. Theobject appears in the images from about 2005 - 2009 July 2nd, 2003 GMT Localtime as displayed on teh images is GMT -5 Hrs. The next opportunity I had toview the abject was 30 minutes later and it was no longer on the screen.The web site for the Live Camera ishttpwww.cenapred.unam.mxpopoUIVR.html.
